Name: Gewürztraminer
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring and summer. Takes 10 days to mature, and continues to produce after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalo en primavera y verano. Tarda 10 días en crecer, pero sigue produciendo tras la primera cosecha. Crece en una espaldera.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 여름 작물. 자라는데 10일 걸리며, 자란 후 계속 수확할 수 있다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天或夏天种植。需要10天成熟，之后连续收获
